nodes.bodyText: Can we have a static JsonParser that is allocated once in a separate Util class and reused by both these Action classes?
I can see why you want to put this single static parser in one place. Is this the right class for it though? Should we move it to some util?

Right. Moving it to util is a good idea. Will merge this (unblock other build issues) and address this as a part of my next PR.
This issue will be resolved once we upgrade the dependency version.
